transcript.name: t1
transcript.comment: This transcript is identical to the RefSeq transcript NM_017436.4 but with the polyA tail removed.

source.name: ISBT Working Party on Red Cell Immunogenetics and Blood Group Terminology

contact.name: Jill Storry
contact.address: Department of Laboratory Medicine, Division of Hematology and Transfusion Medicine, Lund University, Sweden

annotation_set.comment: Annotation is based on Ensembl release 97 (GRCh38 primary assembly)

annotation_set.note:
DRAFT (pending ISBT approval). ---. Polymorphisms in LRG_795, A4GALT give rise to antigenic variants of the P1PK blood group system, P1PK (ISBT 003). ---.
The molecular determinants of this system have not been fully elucidated and remain controversial. They have been described as being present in both the coding transcript, NM_017436.4, as well as non-coding regions (intronic and upstream) of the gene NG_007495.1. (Lai et al., 2014, PMID:25041587; Thurlesson et al., PMID: 20971946; Westman et al., PMID: 23927681).
---. It has been described that polymorphisms in the region between exons 1 and 2 of NM_017436.4 (referred to as exon 2a) are responsible for the P1/P2 phenotype (Thurlesson et al., 2011; Westman et al., 2013). This region is now represented by newly created transcript model NR_146459.1/ENST00000647439.1 (based on Genbank sequence GU902278) which is a 2 exon non-coding transcript. However, other polymorphisms (located around exons 1 and 2 of NM_017436.4) that are outside of the NR_146459.1/ENST00000647439.1 transcript may also be relevant (Lai et al., 2014; Kaczmarek et al., 2018). The mechanism by which these polymorphisms determine P1/P2 phenotype are unclear therefore NR_146459.1/ENST00000647439.1 has not been included in this LRG record.
References. Lai et al., 2014, PMID:25041587. Thurlesson et al., 2011; PMID: 20971946. Westman et al., 2013; PMID: 23927681. Kaczmarek et al., 2018, PMID:29709005.
International Society for Blood Transfusion (ISBT) allele tables. http://www.isbtweb.org/working-parties/red-cell-immunogenetics-and-blood-group-terminology/

source.name: List of locus specific databases for A4GALT
